demo_compare_single_to_multiple module¶

demo_compare_single_to_multiple.data_frame_res(columns, column_names, ts)[source]¶
demo_compare_single_to_multiple.forecating_errors(ts, ts_idx)[source]¶
demo_compare_single_to_multiple.main(file_name, line_indices, header)[source]¶

Compares simultaneous (all-on-all regression) forecasts to individual (one-on-one). The data is in IoT format

Parameters:
  • file_name (str) – file name (.csv) with data in IoT format
  • line_indices – indices of lines to read from file. Lines are enumerated from 1. If “all”, read the whole file
  • header (bool) – Specifies if the file contains a header row
Returns:
Return type:
